Reviews.Title: Good entry level security system
Reviews.Author: D. Schultz "dalesps"
Reviews.Content: I wanted something for my entry so I didn't have to open the front door to someone I didn't know.  This system was easy to set up.  For me the remote control was easier to use than the monitor controls.  The picture is not great and the night vision range very limited, but is ok for my purpose.  The camera is about 15 feet from the front door.  The best feature of this system is the audio.  It is sensitive enough to pick up the sound of a leaf being blown by the wind.  Very good to talk to the visitor without having to open the door.

Reviews.Title: Great security system
Reviews.Author: SCC
Reviews.Content: I installed and started using this system since 3 days ago. It exceeded my expectations. It does everything as advertised. Just plug the camera and the monitor to 110v and paired automatically in just a couple of seconds. No bad surprises or any issue. I installed the camera to watch my home's main entrance and placed the monitor (display) in the secong floor of my house about 60 feet away from the camera, the reception is clear and strong. Please notice that display is black and white (no color image). If for any reason you turn off or unplug the camera and/or the display, it will immediately re-start with issue when you turn it on. You can set a continuous view or can be set to show image on the display only when the camera's motion sensor detects any activity (the sensitivity of the motion sensor is great), also, recording to the included SD card can be set to record continuously or only when the motion sensor detects activity, and can be set to record 5, 10 or 15 seconds everytime the motion sensor detects activity. You can also set to overwrite once the SD card is full, or can be set to stop recording when it gets full. Playing what is recorded in the SD card memory is done just by few clicks to a button. Actually, all the possible settings to the system are easily done with one or few clicks to buttons. The system is great, I fully recommend it. The intercom function works excellent. The video and voice is fully wireless between the camera and the display, and works great. Note that you will need a regular 110 volts connection where you will place the camera and the display.  The unique CONS that I perceive in this system is that btoh camera and display do NOT have the option to run based on batteries (preferably rechargeable batteries), this would be great specially to be able to move the display around different rooms in your house.  But, the system performas great as advertised, and it is a great system,  I fully recommend it!.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, working well
Reviews.Author: splashy
Reviews.Content: I am very happy so far with this set up. The fact that you can talk to people through the camera is a big plus, so that you don't have to open up the door if you don't want to.I like the alarm, which is loud enough to hear when turned all the way up, but not obnoxious. It's a fairly pleasant bleep, bleep sound.The camera does not turn on when there is shadow or tree limb motion, but it does when my cats go through, so that's a good thing. It seems to be able to figure out the difference somehow.Oh, and the set up was fairly painless, once I figured out to turn on the surge protector. :-D The person helping me put the camera up used the enclosed white toothpick looking thing to push in the pairing hole, and it connected right up.The video color is fairly good during the day, there are some adjustments you can make as to how bright you want the picture to be, and the resolution is good enough that you can recognize people. The audio is good enough, so all in all I'm very happy with this set up, for the price. The night vision is just about as good as the day vision, but in black and white which is to be expected with night vision.You have to manually point it where you want it, but if you just want to monitor a certain area that's fine. If you want a camera that you can point in different directions while being inside, this is not the one for you.Note added later: I got more cameras, and discovered that if you have them too close together their signals seem to interfere with each other, leading to the display not working right. I moved the second one further away, and now it's working perfectly. They were right next to each other, pointed in different directions, so I don't know how far you would have to go to not have that problem.

Reviews.Title: SVAT GX301-010 digital wireless security system
Reviews.Author: LHutchinson
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first SVAT GX301-010 digital wireless security system for my home in December 2012.  Absolutely love it.  Very easy installation.  Easy to operate.  I have 2 cameras connected to a 19 inch televion for easy viewing.  I have since purchased 2 additional cameras to expand coverage of my property.  My most recent purchase was for my mother (age 82 and lives alone) which included a 2 camera system with 7 inch monitor.  She has a 7 inch monitor by her bed for nighttime viewing and a 19 inch tv to view during the day so she can see who is at the door prior to opening the door. I do plan to expand her system also.  She feels more secure and is very pleased with her system.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: noonan
Reviews.Content: Simple to set up and provides a clear picture.  Range on wireless is a bit sketchy but was able to get things positioned so signal is now consistent.  In all, I am satisfied with purchase and can recommend the product for relatively close range applications such as a front gate monitor at a residence, for instance.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: We recieved our camera set and it came exactly as described, the only downfall to this system is that when we want to add our additional cameras we will only be able to record one area at a time it will not record all areas we will have to pick and choose which I dont like at all..otherwise this is a good product.

Reviews.Title: works really well
Reviews.Author: grandmother
Reviews.Content: for the money it is worth it.  Does everything they say it will.  The pictures are great and I bought it for the audio performance and it has captured the neighbors barking dogs at all hours of the night so when the officers came out I had something with a time and date to let them hear what the neighborhood was dealing with every night.

Reviews.Title: Basic, Simple, Easy to Set Up and Use
Reviews.Author: Stephen Guth
Reviews.Content: I was hoping that this wireless camera would be easy to set up, easy to use, and work well--and the system is all of that.  It works really well, including at night, and easily records via an optional sim card.  If you're looking for a security camera that's basic, simple, and works, this system might be a good option for you.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Smcd "Yes!Music!"
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera and monitor for the money. I wanted to watch who came to my door and it worked great. BUT... the monoitor only lasted 16 months and then died. You cannot buy only a monitor as a replacement. You must buy the entire set up again.As long as it did work, the picture was great and I liked the alarm sound when it picked up motion. Since I drilled holes into my face brick, I have to see if I can replace the camera without a lot of problems since the two go hand in hand for the signal.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: hereticzero
Reviews.Content: This little monitor and camera have lots of power. This setup makes seeing who is at the door or around the yard a breeze. Easy to install and use. My only complaint is that the remote control could be more user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Nice set
Reviews.Author: R Brownfield
Reviews.Content: I purchased the GX301 to view the blind spot on the property which is my driveway.  It is rainy and cold here in the Northwest winter so I did a quick temporary installation. The camera linked up with the monitor quickly.  It has a nice clear picture and sensitive audio pickup.  I have a large street light mounted on the garage so I can't say how well it does in total darkness but the picture is quite clear at night.  One drawback to this set is the range.  During the day it is fine but when the sun goes down and it gets cold it stats dropping the signal. This is very annoying, but moving the monitor closer (from 50ft to 20ft) to the camera solves the problem.  This spring I will do a more permanent installation and raise the camera up from 8 to 12 ft this should help the range. Like a lot of inexpensive camera units the color washes out somewhat in bright sunlight but all in all it does a nice job and worth what I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and set up. Wireless range for my building is about 50 ft. Picture is good. I love that it records audio as well. Haven't got to check the night pics yet. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for Cost!!!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Meadows
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome! It does everything it says it will do and works real well for the price I paid. The night vision doesn't work as good as I would expect but during the daytime I could see everything real clear. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking to get a good security camera for a low price. Just make sure you DO NOT get anything more than 32 GB SD card. It will only take up to 32 GB.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup!
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Hanssen
Reviews.Content: This security system is great. Actually set up in minutes. Easy to adjust the camera and is clear. Remote is handy. Price was right.

Reviews.Title: For The Money, Not A Bad System
Reviews.Author: Phillip Day "Phillip Day"
Reviews.Content: Easy to set-up, easy to install except for the bracket to the camera, it's useless. Thank goodness I had another bracket from an old camera to modify to fit because the one they send with this unit doesn't work. The camera did sync with the base unit right away. The unit has a good picture in day or night. The range for the movement sensor is limited to the 40 feet so if you want to detect movement from long range this unit won't work for that. Basically it's ok for the price other than the camera mounting bracket which is useless. The picture is in color and the movement audio sensor does work.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: J. Ives
Reviews.Content: Would recommend it.  No problems. The setup was easy.  Enjoy the feeling of security.  It has good sound and a good picture.  Would like to get more cameras to add to the system.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Security Camera and Monitor
Reviews.Author: Anna M. Peace
Reviews.Content: The Security camera is very easy to install and provides good video.  At night it's not so good but only because I have a street light that keeps the camera from going into night mode.  The monitor is a little more tricky.  It took me half an hour to figure out that to get it to record you have to have a button pushed on the front of the monitor as well as having it set up in the software.  That being said, it does exactly what I need it to.

Reviews.Title: SVAT GX301-010 Digital  by John Whelan
Reviews.Author: JOHN T WHELAN
Reviews.Content: The system is wireless which is what I had been looking for due to the difficulty of hanging wire for our situation. It is also relativly easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Only lasted a year
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This just did not work that well. We had in our baby's room but the monitor keep going black. We had problems with it after two months and it died before a year was over. The monitor seemed very cheap.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: Rn- Panda
Reviews.Content: This system was very easy and quick to set up. Good video quality, day and night. Good sound quality. So far very happy with price vs quality.

Reviews.Title: Great for travel trailer
Reviews.Author: D_Hunt
Reviews.Content: Reveived this as a gift for our travel trailer. Just have to build a couple of simple voltage regulators to reduce the vehicle voltage from 12v to 5v (to power monitor) & 9v (to power camera). Great product and easy to mount.

Reviews.Title: another disappointment
Reviews.Author: taxt
Reviews.Content: I had bought and installed a bunch of their Defender cameras with monitors and was happy with them, then bought a couple they seem to have downgraded signal strength-wise, very disappointing, thought I'd try paying more for their SVAT model and found absolutely no difference in the weak signal, though the monitor did seem better constructed than those with the Defender systems.  I'm going to have to buy more and sure hope one of these gets better or I can find another brand that's better but am having my doubts.  Big doubts.

Reviews.Title: Nice home security camera
Reviews.Author: Drazen J.
Reviews.Content: The camera is awesome - it does what is says, and records with no problems in the daylight and during the night. The IR movies are really crisp and one can see facial features - they are recognizable. It is infrared triggered (unless you set it to record all the time) and the range for the trigger is ~ 15 feet in my experience. The only reason I am not giving it 5 starts, but 4, is the fact that the base unit (recording unit) does not auto-restart in case of power failure. We recently went for a long vacation, and all the recordings are fine, but there was a power failure, and there was nothing for the last four days.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SECURITY
Reviews.Author: Ms Tasha
Reviews.Content: It really provide excellent video feed. The quality of the camera is beyond my expectations. It give your family a sense of relief knowing they are safe.

Reviews.Title: I stongly recomend buying a better one
Reviews.Author: D W Dixon
Reviews.Content: The camera was OK for about 6 months. The mount is really super cheap. It will rotate with some engineering but the up & down positioning is zero.  I have thrown it away.

Reviews.Title: For me, complete piece of junk.
Reviews.Author: D. A. Sherman "survivor"
Reviews.Content: I spent over an hour trying to sync this stupid thing to the base, and it was a whopping 25 feet away! No steel walls, no major interference issues that they didn't identify before I bought it. All I know is, I could get it to work if it was sitting NEXT to the base, but mounting it 25 feet away, outside, was impossible. Junk...Now, onto the mounting. That wonderful mounting bracket they provide with this thing is GARBAGE! I tightened the cheap wingnut down as hard as I could, and STILL the thing wouldn't hold it. Finally, I tightened it so hard the wingnut (made out of cheap junk, like most everything else on this thing is) got locked inside the threading-wouldn't tighten, wouldn't loosen. All in all, if this thing would have cost 25 bucks it would have been of dubious value. For 200 it's silly!

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: Mike Poulin
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and operate this system. I opened the box, drilled one hole, thread wire, attached camera next to front door, plugged it in, plugged in Monitor, turned it on, BANG! front door appeared on screen, sound came on, and it was up and running. I latter read through the manual, found it an easy read and very understandable.

Reviews.Title: look out!
Reviews.Author: davydav
Reviews.Content: this was bought to capture stealing neighbors and is doing the job!  maybe for them jail time might be next.  THANKS!

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Gena Guerin
Reviews.Content: We purchased the system because we had some things stolen out of our garage and vandalism to our vehicle.  We expect this to happen again and need proof of the identity of the individual.  The cameras work well.  The picture quality is clear and captures much farther than we expected.  The only drawback is the fact that we had the alarm set to go off at night often keeping us awake.  We were unaware of how many wild bunnies played in our yard in the middle of the night!  They set the motion sensor off many times and we had to turn the alarm off.

Reviews.Title: Svat GX301
Reviews.Author: P. McAnish
Reviews.Content: I like the camera overall but as another reviewer has mentioned, the auto movement activation is limited. I also get about 15'.  My needs are 20' minimum so I guess I will have to set it to continually record. I have a 32 GB SD card in it but have no idea how much video that will give me before it overwrites itself.I also wonder why it only can take a 32 GB card since 64 and 128 GB are available.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our needs!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Mitchell
Reviews.Content: Super product! It does exactly what we need ........ don't know why we didn't get one sooner. EASY to install ("plug ....... and play"). If you're interested in this kind of product ....... get THIS one.

Reviews.Title: Blurry images lack detail.
Reviews.Author: Sunny
Reviews.Content: Image focus is not sharp both in daylight and night mode. Objects in motion are too blurred and lack detail.

Reviews.Title: really cool product
Reviews.Author: Fred Smith "donwonfred"
Reviews.Content: Does everything it says. I bought this for my parents. they never know who is at the door until they are right at the door. With this unit they can hear and see who's is coming before they get there. My pops said he actually heard the squirrel's playing in the snow through the monitor. I am going to buy another for my self.

Reviews.Title: Great to know who's knocking
Reviews.Author: mhoop
Reviews.Content: We were tired of door to door salesman and wanted a simple, economical way to know who was at the door.  Now I can look at monitor every time the doorbell rings and decide whether I want to answer it or not.  Picture is clear enough to recognize whom is at door, even at night.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: NCMEL
Reviews.Content: So far this has been a good system for the money.  Wished the motion detection had a farther range but it's still a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: SVAT Wireless Security Camera and 7" Monitor
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This system was recommended by a friend and it is perfect, exactly what I wanted. Works perfectly and received it on time. A very good value also.
